title: Tour of Poland stage 7: Matej Mohorič hangs tough for GC victory after bonus points battle
content:
Tim Merlier wins final stage for second victory of the Tour as Mohorič beats back GC rival João Almeida in tense final day of racing.

Read the full article at Tour of Poland stage 7: Matej Mohorič hangs tough for GC victory after bonus points battle on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
